long_desc: Isha the Dark Elf is here, observing you silently.
flags_raw: She is no less than beautiful, skin as dark as the night and hair
stats1_raw: shining like silver in the moonlight.  Her slender body is adorned
stats2_raw: with a sleeveless shirt and a short skirt made from black scales
stats3_raw: joined with silver threads.  Her back is covered by a large, hooded
